body:
Comment 2 by **jcowgar**: 
Govet duplicates the compile in some situations, for example:

package main

func main() {
    a := "John Doe
}

i.e. no ending quote. 

$ govet hello.go
govet: hello.go: hello.go:4:8 string not terminated (and 1 more error)

Shouldn't it also report other obvious errors? I see govet as a tool that can report
real time feedback to the programmer w/out attempting a compile.
